"Ran": "This goes out to all ARKS members. We have detected extremely powerful DOLLS readings in the heart of Resol Forest."
"Based on our past records, it appears to be the Battlefield Overseer-type DOLL known as Nex Vera."
"Battlefield Overseer-type DOLLS are extremely dangerous, and their presence often increases DOLLS activity nearby."
"Watch out for more aggressive enemies as you approach your target."
